articles.title: Ionos homepage kit in test 2025: Our experiences
articles.summary: IONOS has launched MyWebsite Now Shop Plus, an AI-powered website builder designed for e-commerce. The platform offers features such as AI-driven design and content creation, management of up to 5,000 products, SEO and marketing tools, and multilingual website translation, providing a comprehensive solution for online businesses.

articles.title: Bed Bath & Beyond returns with store opening in Nashville
articles.author: Lisa Hornung
articles.summary: Brand Collective has launched a new store named 'Bed Bath & Beyond Home' in Nashville. This launch marks the reintroduction of the Bed Bath & Beyond brand after its bankruptcy. The new store aims to cater to how families gather at home today.

articles.title: I Regret To Inform The TikTok Haters That These 36 Products Are Actually Spectacular At Their Jobs
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several companies are introducing new products. Gold Bond is launching a firming neck and chest cream. Eos has released a limited edition Marshmallow "Super Balm" lip treatment. Lottabody has launched Coconut Oil Foaming Curl Mousse for all hair types, and Clinique is promoting its Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm in Black Honey.

articles.title: Exploring the Integration of OpenAI's Latest Models with RTX GPUs for Enhanced Performance and Efficiency
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: NVIDIA is releasing open-source large language models (LLMs) and introducing Foundry Local, a new on-device AI inferencing solution. This solution empowers developers and AI enthusiasts to build innovative AI-accelerated applications, while also integrating OpenAI models with RTX GPUs for enhanced performance and efficiency. Foundry Local operates seamlessly through command line, SDKs, and APIs.

articles.title: OpenAI launches GPT-5, nano, mini and Pro — not AGI, but capable of generating 'software-on-demand'
articles.author: Carl Franzen
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched a new family of large language models, GPT-5, as a successor to GPT-4. The company is introducing four versions of the model: GPT-5, GPT-5 Mini, GPT-5 Nano, and GPT-5 Pro, each designed for different use cases based on speed, cost, and computational needs. GPT-5 will power ChatGPT exclusively and replace all other models.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold7 Review: Thinner, Lighter, and Almost Flawless
articles.author: Sourabh Kulesh
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Fold7, a foldable smartphone featuring a slimmed-down design, an 8-inch flexible OLED screen with a nearly invisible crease, and a Snapdragon 8 Elite chip for flagship performance. The device, priced at Rs 1,74,999, also boasts an impressive triple camera setup and AI-enhanced software, marking a significant advancement in foldable technology.

articles.title: New Balance's 'Cloud-Like' $80 Running Sneakers Are Now 31% Off
articles.author: Chris Yuscavage
articles.summary: New Balance has discounted the Fresh Foam 680v8 sneaker to $55 for a limited time. The Fresh Foam 680v8 features a precision-engineered knit upper, a well-built rubber outsole, and a Fresh Foam midsole for superior cushioning. New Balance created this midsole with renewable resources to reduce the brand's carbon footprint.

articles.title: Save $330 on this 'powerful' and 'super efficient' cordless vacuum — it's 66% off on Amazon Canada right now
articles.author: Melina Brum
articles.summary: MQDXE introduced a Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner featuring powerful suction, a 55-minute runtime, and an anti-tangle brush. The vacuum includes HEPA filters and an LED flex head, and is currently available on Amazon Canada for $170, representing a 66% discount.

articles.title: 28 Products That Are Definitely Smart Purchases
articles.author: Samantha Wieder
articles.summary: The article highlights the launch of several new products, including Dawn Powerwash dish spray, which is designed to cut through grease faster than regular dish soap, and the Ninja Creami, which allows users to create a variety of frozen desserts at home. Additionally, the L'Oreal glow-enhancing lotion is presented as an alternative to expensive bronzing drops.

articles.title: Jennifer Aniston's Hair Brand Just Released a New Dry Shampoo
articles.author: Jasmine Washington
articles.summary: Jennifer Aniston's haircare collection, LolaVie, recently launched a new product called LolaVie Powder Perfect Dry Shampoo. This dry shampoo is formulated with rice starch, bamboo silica, colloidal oat flour, crushed rose quartz, emerald, topaz, and pea peptides. It is designed to zap oil, volumize hair, cleanse, soothe, hydrate the scalp, and boost shine.

articles.title: AI Tools Reshape Marketing as Businesses Chase Growth
articles.author: Africa
articles.summary: Arting.ai introduces a video personalization platform that allows marketers to swap faces in videos seamlessly, reducing production costs. AdMaker.ai launches an ad automation platform that generates ad variations and optimizes campaigns for increased click-through rates and faster launches. These platforms are utilized to create hyper-targeted campaigns, resulting in increased sales and efficiency for businesses.

articles.title: 33 Products *Thousands* Of Reviewers Love
articles.author: Jessica Hall
articles.summary: The article highlights several products including the OmieBox, which elevates the bento box with a thermos, Elizabeth Mott's Thank Me Later Eye Primer for long-lasting smoky eye looks, and Affresh washing machine tablets for cleaning washing machines. Additionally, the article mentions a Cosori gooseneck electric kettle for precise temperature control and a SlumberPod for blackout sleep during travel.

articles.title: How to connect your Android phone to a Windows PC using Phone Link
articles.author: Thomas Deehan
articles.summary: Phone Link allows users to connect their Android phones to Windows devices, offering functionalities like receiving notifications, responding to messages, making calls, accessing photos, and running apps directly from the desktop. The service also includes a 'Find my phone' function and music control capabilities, enhancing productivity by minimizing phone distractions.

articles.title: The Dunelm bedding shopper called 'the best I've ever bought' that comes in 4 colours
articles.author: Katrina Chilver
articles.summary: Dunelm is offering 'The Linen Yard's Cotton Duvet Cover and Pillowcase Set', which features a striped, reversible design in multiple sizes and colors, priced from £24 to £44. The retailer is also offering 'Whitley duvet cover set', discounted to £63 from £90.

articles.title: Trump Media & GB News: Exclusive on Truth+ USA 🇺🇸
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Trump Media is expanding Truth Social into Truth+, which is a subscription service bundling news content, potentially with GB News. Truth+ will offer exclusive content like live streams and documentaries within the Truth Social platform ecosystem. The aim is to create a walled garden, incentivizing users to stay within the platform.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip7 review: Small, smart, and a little addictive
articles.author: Sami Khan
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Flip7, a foldable phone with a starting price of ₹109,999. This new iteration features improvements such as a slimmer design, a redesigned hinge, a larger 4.1-inch cover display, and the Exynos 2500 deca-core chipset. The Galaxy Z Flip7 boasts enhanced functionality and improved performance.

articles.title: Grab This $80 Smartwatch at Walmart for Only $22
articles.author: Kelsey Mccarson
articles.summary: Walmart is selling the LZUEFK 1.85-inch Men's and Women's Smartwatch for $22, with a clickable coupon reducing the price. The smartwatch is compatible with Android and iOS, is IP68 Waterproof, features a 1.85-inch full touch screen, has over 100 exercise modes, and includes an integrated voice assistant.

articles.title: Raksha Bandhan: 7 Best Gifts For The Foodie Bhai
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a nut-based gift set containing almonds, cashews, walnuts, and raisins.

articles.title: Next's waffle bedding from £35 is 'so comfy to sleep in'
articles.author: Nina Crighton
articles.summary: Next offers Waffle Duvet Cover and Pillowcase Sets in various colors, starting at £35. Dusk's Portofino Waffle 100% Cotton Duvet Cover has a 50% price drop, now starting at £25. Dunelm offers the Alston Waffle Duvet Cover and Pillowcase Set from £22.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Fold 7 review: I tested Samsung's £1,899 foldable smartphone - here's why it's perfect for solo travellers
articles.author: WILIAM HUNTER
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Fold 7, a foldable phone featuring an 8-inch AMOLED folding display and a 6.5-inch outer display. The Galaxy Fold 7 includes features like an adaptive refresh rate of 120Hz, the Snapdragon 8 Elite chip, 12 GB of RAM and AI tools, and is available for £1,799.

articles.title: Samsung Makes New Free Offer To Millions Of Galaxy Phones
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Samsung provides a free subscription to millions of Galaxy phone users. This promotion enhances the value proposition of the Galaxy product line.

articles.title: 38 Products That Keep Your Home Clutter-Free
articles.author: Sally Elshorafa
articles.summary: Several organization products are introduced that can be purchased on Amazon and Etsy. These include shoe organizers (Shoe Slotz and hanging organizers), drawer dividers, cable organizers (DMoose), dispensers and containers (drink dispensers, Oxo food storage), hangers, racks, and more. Many of these products are offered by small businesses such as The Roll Keeper and Storage Theory.

articles.title: 'Gorgeous' Next dress a must-have for summer - it's available in three colours
articles.summary: Next introduced the Puff Sleeve Midi Dress, priced between £52 and £56, available in white floral, yellow, and teal. The dress is made from a cotton-viscose blend and features a shirred bodice and puff sleeves. Next suggests styling the dress with sandals and a raffia bag.

articles.title: Home Bargains slashes 'luxury in a bottle' £20 skincare to £3
articles.author: Amber O'Connor
articles.summary: Home Bargains has discounted Jil Sander Simply Shower Gel 150ml from £20 to £2.99. NIVEA Wash Gel Refreshing 150ml is reduced from £4.59 to £2.49, while Dove Body Wash Velvet Glow 225ml is down from £3.50 to £1.49. Additionally, Moroccanoil Color Complete Shampoo 70ml and Conditioner 70ml are both on offer from £10 to £1.49.

articles.title: TikTok Convinced Me to Try This ‘Magic Soap' for a Week
articles.author: Nealy Simms
articles.summary: Dr. Bronner's has expanded its product line to include various formats of their Magic Soap, such as bar soap, hand wash, and hair rinse. This provides consumers with easier, ready-to-use options for the company's popular product.

articles.title: JOHNNIE WALKER BLONDE x BLNDE: A New Kind of Spirit
articles.author: Musa Adekunle
articles.summary: Johnnie Walker has launched Johnnie Walker Blonde, a new blended scotch whisky. This launch includes a partnership with music artist BLNDE, who is serving as the brand ambassador. Johnnie Walker Blonde aims to offer a lighter and smoother whisky experience.

articles.title: Home Bargains reduces 'irresistible' beauty buy for 'soft skin' from £20 to £3
articles.author: Amber O'Connor
articles.summary: Home Bargains is offering significant discounts on various beauty products. Jil Sander Simply Shower Gel 150ml is reduced from £20 to £2.99, NIVEA Wash Gel Refreshing 150ml is discounted from £4.59 to £2.49, Dove Body Wash Velvet Glow 225ml is reduced from £3.50 to £1.49, and Moroccanoil Color Complete Shampoo and Conditioner 70ml are both on offer from £10 to £1.49.

articles.title: Creative digital marketing agency: Blending imagination with strategy for unmatched growth
articles.author: Sarah Dunsby
articles.summary: Creative digital marketing agencies provide branding, content creation, and website design to assist companies in launching new products and rebranding. They offer services like SEO, video production, and email marketing to build brand awareness and generate leads. Startups launching new brands or product lines can utilize these agencies to gain a competitive edge through distinctive branding and creative marketing strategies.

articles.title: Reconsidering Your Relationship: The Case for Parting Ways with Your Iron
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Einsen is launching a new device that aims to replace traditional ironing. The device uses superheated steam and a patented 3D ironing system to remove wrinkles from clothes in under 60 seconds. A companion app also unlocks customizable features, including hygiene, eco, and refresh modes.

articles.title: I tried Naked Wines: is 12 bottles for £65 worth it?
articles.author: Reviews Manager
articles.summary: Naked Wines provides an introductory offer for new customers: a case of 12 wines is discounted to £64.99. The company also offers a monthly "Angel" membership which provides store credit, letting customers purchase a hand-picked selection of exclusive wines and access more information about them.

articles.title: PHP Domain and Hosting Signup Script with Domain Availability and WHOIS Checker
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: domainCart offers a PHP-based domain name and web hosting order system. The system features AJAX domain availability and whois checker and support for checking multiple TLDs with over 700 domain extensions and accepting online payments on PayPal.

articles.title: New M&S skirt for £30 is 'cute and chic' with 'bonus' feature
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer introduced the Linen Blend Mini Skirt for £29.50. This skirt features a mini length and side slit, and it is available in black in sizes 6-24.

articles.title: £2 B&M buy inspired the Stacey Solomon declutter I needed
articles.author: Emma Gill
articles.summary: B&M is offering new clear plastic diamond patterned organizers starting from £2, including an 11-section organizer for £5. Home Bargains is selling the Zoflora Queen cleaning caddy for £4.99, designed to store cleaning products.

articles.title: 41 Home Items That'll Make Guests Think, "Ooooh, Nice"
articles.author: Ashley Schumacher
articles.summary: Dreame launched a cordless 2-in-1 vacuum and mop, now available on Amazon for $359.99. This device self-propels, self-dries, and self-cleans, simplifying floor cleaning. The vacuum's suction is powerful, and the self-cleaning function eliminates messy maintenance.

articles.title: 'Silky' £36 foundation gives 'perfect amount of coverage' without going 'cakey'
articles.author: Lauren Codling
articles.summary: bareMinerals launched the Original Pressed Powder Foundation to celebrate its 30th anniversary. The new powder foundation offers medium coverage with a radiant finish and SPF 15. Early reviews are positive, praising its coverage and suitability for various skin types.

articles.title: I tested Google Veo 3 - this AI video generation tool is scarily good
articles.summary: Google AI Pro launched Veo 3, a video-creation tool that generates eight-second video clips from text prompts. Google also announced its 'Made by Google' event on August 20, 2025, where the Pixel 10 series and a new foldable phone are expected to be introduced.

articles.title: New Trafford Centre bakery serving Croc waffles and dinosaur ice cream cones
articles.author: Dianne Bourne
articles.summary: Hello Oriental Bakery launched a new bakery at the Trafford Centre, introducing Croc waffles and dinosaur ice cream cones. The waffles are priced at £4 plain or £6 with ice cream and toppings. The bakery also sells Shimmering Vimto fruit teas, Vietnamese Iced Coffee and other bakes.

articles.title: Are foldable phones worth buying in 2025? I say heck yes.
articles.author: Timothy Beck Werth
articles.summary: Samsung has released a new generation of foldable Galaxy phones. Google is expected to release the Pixel 10 Pro Fold, and Apple is also anticipated to launch a foldable phone. Current foldable phones have improved hinge designs, thinner profiles, and enhanced displays.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 deal: Get a free $200 gift card
articles.author: Christina Buff
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a free $200 gift card with the purchase of an unlocked Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 (256GB or 512GB) until August 10. This promotion is available for a limited time through Amazon.

articles.title: Best hair dryer deal: Save $80 on the Dyson Supersonic Origin
articles.author: Brittany Vincent
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a discount of 21% on the Dyson Supersonic Origin hair dryer. The price has been reduced to $299.99 from its usual price of $379.99 as of Aug 7.

articles.title: As AI chatbots gain popularity, so does business of inserting ads into results
articles.author: South China Morning Post
articles.summary: Big Fish Marketing is offering new Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) services with packages ranging from 3,800 yuan to 29,800 yuan. The most expensive package guarantees results for at least 12 out of 20 prompts per month, with refunds offered for failed prompts. Perplexity AI has begun experimenting with ads in its AI chatbot service.

articles.title: MTN Nigeria introduces digital online assistant
articles.author: New Telegraph
articles.summary: MTN Nigeria launched 'Zigi,' an online assistant chatbot. Zigi is designed to enhance customers' digital interactions with the brand, providing speedy and secure marketing, sales, and technical support through multiple channels like WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, Telegram, the official MTN website, and myMTN.

articles.title: Vivo V60 5G mobile vs Vivo X200 FE: What to expect from this sibling rivalry
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Vivo will launch its latest V-series phone, the Vivo V60, on August 12. The Vivo V60 features Zeiss branding, indicating a camera-centric focus for the new phone.

articles.title: Your guide to shopping online at Melbourne Airport's Laneway
articles.summary: Melbourne Airport introduces Laneway, an online duty-free shopping service. Travelers can shop online up to 24 hours before their flight and collect their purchases upon arrival or departure at the airport. The service offers a variety of products including liquor, beauty items, watches, and skincare.

articles.title: Phunware Reports Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results  Aug. 9, 2025 04:05
articles.summary: Phunware introduced new AI-powered product features, the AI Concierge and Guest Services Agent, at HITEC 2025, aimed at enhancing mobile interaction in the hospitality sector. They also released Map Editor 3.0, a major update to their Multiscreen-as-a-Service platform. These innovations demonstrate Phunware's commitment to expanding its AI offerings and improving its existing mobile application platform.

articles.title: e-Commerce Platform with Tech Services Launched
articles.author: Thisday
articles.summary: A new e-commerce platform offering tech services has been launched. This platform represents a new service offering within the e-commerce sector.

articles.title: Google Launches New Initiative
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Google launched a new initiative. This represents a new product or service announcement from Google.

articles.title: 28 Products You'll End Up Using Forever
articles.author: Celia Funderburk
articles.summary: The article presents a Levoit air purifier for allergy relief. It also introduces a TruSkin vitamin C serum for skin brightening and The Pink Stuff cleaning paste for stain removal. Furthermore, the article presents Cuisinart food processor for food preparation, Bissell carpet cleaner for stain removal, AirFly wireless transmitter for cordless listening and Revlon hot air brush for hair styling. Olaplex repairing hair treatment is also introduced as well as Essence Lash Princess mascara for lash volume. Lastly, the SwitchBot Smart Switch button pusher and Wet & Forget shower cleaner are presented.

articles.title: Insights from JoongAng Ilbo
articles.summary: Taboola is expanding its advertising integration across mobile and desktop platforms, deploying updated ad modules ('favoriteAD' for desktop and 'onlyMB' for mobile). This expansion aims to enhance ad delivery and user experience by leveraging Taboola's technology to deliver more relevant and engaging advertising content.

articles.title: Amazon is selling $28 Adidas slides for only $15 that are 'comfortable' and 'durable'
articles.author: Adam Reeder
articles.summary: Amazon is currently offering Adidas sandals at a discounted price. These slides are presented as a comfortable and convenient footwear option for the summer.

articles.title: As AI chatbots gain popularity in China, so does the business of inserting ads into results
articles.author: Coco Feng
articles.summary: Big Fish Marketing in Shenzhen has introduced Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) services to help brands gain visibility in AI-generated answers. They offer packages ranging from 3,800 yuan to 29,800 yuan, with guarantees on the number of prompts that deliver results. Perplexity AI has begun experimenting with ads displayed as sponsored follow-up questions.

articles.title: Shaved ice on wheels, new florist, New Windsor Depot and more Quad-Cities business news
articles.author: Quad-City Times
articles.summary: A new mobile vendor is offering flavored shaved ice. A new florist has opened in the Quad-Cities. New Windsor Depot is now serving breakfast.

articles.title: Maharashtra government permits production of grain-based liquor
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: A new category of product called Maharashtra Made Liquor (MML) has been introduced.

articles.title: NLX and Amazon Web Services Deliver Generative AI-Powered Conversational Experiences for Saks Fifth Avenue
articles.author: Gettysburg Times
articles.summary: A Luxury Retailer is enhancing its customer service experience by implementing patented NLX technology. NLX combines voice, chat, and visuals, utilizing Amazon Bedrock and Amazon Connect for its operation.

articles.title: Virgin Media dishes out free 4K TV and �145 bill credit to consumers who do ...
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: Virgin Media is offering a new deal to new TV service customers. This deal includes a free 4K Toshiba TV.

articles.title: GPT-5 Makes ChatGPT More Useful With These 3 Major Upgrades
articles.author: BGR
articles.summary: The updated ChatGPT model (GPT-5) introduces three new features. These new features aim to provide enhanced functionality for users.
